suffdict.name: vFlexPacha

entry.comment: must be followed by vFlexSimple, vFlexFuture, or vFlexRemCerc; is it right=v??? seems unlikely

suffdict.comment:
trouble comes with pacha+Simple endings it looks to me like pacha may get lengthened before taking the simple endings, which being "strong", then optionally reduce the lengthened vowel back down to a short one
so assume pacha : Simple and see how that works
